home.title: 2026 Taipei Wego Senior High School Self-Directed Study Outcome Display
home.theme_description0: Dark clouds blot out moon and stars; truth is silenced, thought shackled. Yet some remain awake. Beneath microscopes and in lab notebooks, flickers of light and rows of data speak in secret.
home.theme_description1: Students gather in hidden rooms, measuring truth with instruments, writing the unspoken in symbols, leaving sparks of hope in margins, attics, and pressed leaves.
home.theme_description2: Ten years of cold cannot still the blood of those who risked everything-not to stir upheaval, but to prove light endures.
home.theme_description3: They charted stars, passed incomplete books, and let equations become banners of freedom.
home.theme_description4: Now, as wind flips yellowed pages, those hidden embers converge into the first light breaking the darkâ€” pure, sharp, and unyielding.
